mapper.update:
update si_storage_label
print_label_id = #{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
location_id = #{locationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
package_id = #{packageId,jdbcType=CHAR},
source_no = #{sourceNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
source_type = #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
storage_num = #{storageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
storage_time = #{storageTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
material_lock_id = #{materialLockId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where storage_label_id = #{storageLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update si_storage_label set print_label_id = #{printLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, location_id = #{locationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, package_id = #{packageId,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_no = #{sourceNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_type = #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, storage_num = #{storageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, storage_time = #{storageTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, material_lock_id = #{materialLockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where storage_label_id = #{storageLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: sl.storage_label_id, sl.print_label_id, sl.material_id, sl.location_id, sl.package_id, sl.source_no, sl.source_type, sl.`type`, sl.storage_num, sl.storage_time, sl.material_lock_id, sl.`status`, l.location_no

sl.storage_label_id, sl.print_label_id, sl.material_id, sl.location_id, sl.package_id, sl.source_no, sl.source_type, sl.`type`, sl.storage_num, sl.storage_time, sl.material_lock_id, sl.`status`, l.location_no, m.material_no, m.material_name, m.material_type, m.material_model, w.warehouse_name, ml.material_lock_name, s.supplier_name, pl.produce_batch
mapper.select:
select
from si_storage_label sl left join si_material m on sl.material_id = m.material_id left join si_location l on sl.location_id = l.location_id left join si_warehouse w on l.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id left join dd_material_lock ml on sl.material_lock_id = ml.material_lock_id left join si_supplier s on m.supplier_id = s.supplier_id left join si_print_label pl on sl.print_label_id = pl.print_label_id
and (m.material_no like '%' #{keyword,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' or m.material_name like '%' #{keyword,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' or sl.package_id like '%' #{keyword,jdbcType=CHAR} '%')
and pl.produce_batch like '%' #{pbatch,jdbcType=CHAR} '%'
and w.warehouse_id = #{wid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and l.location_id = #{lid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and s.supplier_name like '%' #{sname,jdbcType=CHAR} '%'
and sl.material_lock_id is not null
and sl.material_lock_id is null
and m.material_type != 3
and m.material_type = #{mtype,jdbcType=TINYINT}
order by sl.storage_time desc

select
from si_storage_label sl left join si_print_label pl on sl.print_label_id = pl.print_label_id left join si_location l on sl.location_id = l.location_id where sl.material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and sl.type = 1 and sl.material_lock_id is null and sl.`status` = 1 and pl.dr = 1
and sl.source_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
order by pl.create_time asc
